title: The Story of Drifted Girls in Different World ~The Adventure of Miko~ - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Beastkin   Fantasy World   Game Elements   S*aves   Sword And Magic   Tragic Past
author: Kouta   コウタ
description:
A girl with androphobia, Shitagai Miko, Even though having a painful past, she kept moving forward while fighting her trauma. But she was killed by her heartless friend. And she drifted to a different world. In there Miko challenged towers that had been built by Gods to find the reason why she was brought to the foreign world.

This is salvation and trial story of a girl who was unfortunately killed.>
